Name: Requiem
About the game: Explore and escape twisting realms in this dark action puzzle game. Delving through surreal landscapes pocketed throughout the cathedral, Isaiah must confront his deadly sins by warding them off in unique worlds and boss battles. Discover new tools to help you through your journey, and uncover Isaiah's past sins to escape purgatory! Explore and Escape the seven levels of Isaiah's personal hell Outwit monstrous demons and overcome puzzling trials Find useful tools to help you along your journey and interact with your surroundings Platform through unique environments inspired by Isaiah's past Overcome Isaiah's dark past and ultimately decide his fate
Meta Title: Requiem: May 4, 2021, Hellion Studios and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Requiem? Check out the release date (May 4, 2021), developer insights from Hellion Studios, and a complete game summary.
